sentences.en: all the latest gossip
sentences.cn: 最近所有的流言蜚语

sentences.en: Companies from across Europe are here to unveil their latest models.
sentences.cn: 全欧洲的公司都来到这里展示其最新款产品。

sentences.en: Featured are both his classics and his latest creations.
sentences.cn: 他的经典作品和最新创作都很独特。

sentences.en: From her wardrobe Laura took her latest acquisition, a bright red dress.
sentences.cn: 劳拉从衣柜里拿出了她最近的购物战果，一件鲜红色连衣裙。

sentences.en: Have it done by Tuesday at the latest.
sentences.cn: 最迟得在星期二完成

sentences.en: He and his family have walk-on parts in the latest film.
sentences.cn: 他和家人在最新的这部电影中有跑龙套的角色。

sentences.en: He telephoned me the latest news.
sentences.cn: 他打电话告诉我最新的消息。

sentences.en: His latest book of poetry will be published by Faber in May.
sentences.cn: 他的最新诗集将由菲贝尔出版公司于5月出版。

sentences.en: His latest film is one of the funniest he’s ever made.
sentences.cn: 最新的这部影片是他最搞笑的电影之一。

sentences.en: His latest novel was cut up by the reviewers.
sentences.cn: 他的最新小说被评论家批得体无完肤。

sentences.en: I use the short-wave radio to get the latest war news.
sentences.cn: 我用短波收音机收听最新的战事新闻。

sentences.en: In order to prove his point he showed them the latest sales figures.
sentences.cn: 为了证明他的观点，他给他们看了最新的销售数字。

sentences.en: It's the latest in a long line of tragedies.
sentences.cn: 这是一长串悲剧事件中最新的一件。

sentences.en: Jack showed off his latest squeeze at the weekend.
sentences.cn: 周末杰克炫耀了一番自己新交的女朋友。

sentences.en: Latest reports say another five people have been killed.
sentences.cn: 最新报道称又有5人被害。

sentences.en: Latest reports say that mud slides buried entire villages.
sentences.cn: 最新报道说泥石流掩埋了整个整个的村庄。

sentences.en: She should be back by ten o'clock at the latest.
sentences.cn: 她最晚应该在10点前回来。

sentences.en: The growing problem is underlined in the latest issue of the Lancet.
sentences.cn: 最近一期的《柳叶刀》杂志中强调了这一日益严重的问题。

sentences.en: The latest opinion polls are predicting a very close contest.
sentences.cn: 最近的民意测验预测竞争将会非常激烈。

sentences.en: The latest techniques in oceanography are now available to many more scientists.
sentences.cn: 更多的科学家现在能够接触到海洋学的最新技术。

sentences.en: They will be helped by the very latest in navigation aids.
sentences.cn: 他们将会受益于最新的导航系统。

trans.tran_en: the most recent or the newest

trans.tran_cn: 最新事物，最新消息，至迟
trans.tran_en: the most recent or newest thing
